scripts.generate: swagger-typescript-api generate --silent --responses --unwrap-response-data --extract-request-params --extract-request-body --extract-response-body --extract-response-error --patch --clean-output --api-class-name Backend --module-name-first-tag --debug --extract-enums --sort-routes --sort-types --axios --route-types -p ../backend/generate/swagger/swagger.yaml  -o ./src/util/backend -n backend.ts  && LN=$(grep -n axios ./src/util/backend/backend.ts | head -1 | cut -d: -f1) && sed -i '' "1,${LN}s/?: /: /g" ./src/util/backend/backend.ts && cp ../backend/generate/swagger/swagger.md ./src/util/backend/backend.md
